metadata.title: CVE-2022-2124 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: Buffer Over-read in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.

notes.note: ccdm94> in focal and earlier file to be patched is src/search.c instead of src/textobject.c. In focal and earlier, POC causes vim process to hang, and valgrind output does not include the out-of-bounds access.

criterions.comment: vim package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
